GeneDef.label: overrided hivemind
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can connect and disconnect themselves from the hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Allows itself to be <color=#8a8ae6>overridden</color> at any time, which causes <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind sync</color>hronization.
Self-<color=#8a8ae6>override</color> allows disconnecting and connecting to the <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color>.
Disconnecting from the <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> is impossible if any <color=#8a8ae6>active hivemind genes</color> are present.
